subject: Boston Marathon Bombings (2013)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox beat the Rays on a run-scoring double by Mike Napoli in the ninth inning, but less than an hour after the game, explosions could be heard at Fenway Park.
snippet: The Red Sox beat the Rays on a run-scoring double by Mike Napoli in the ninth inning, but less than an hour after the game, explosions could be heard at Fenway Park.
